dublinCore.title: 113 HR 2632 IH: School-based Health Centers Program Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Capps (for herself, Mrs. Napolitano, Mr. Rangel, Ms. Lee of California, Ms. Roybal-Allard, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Sarbanes, Ms. Brownley of California, Mr. Farr, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Levin, Ms. DeLauro, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Polis, Mr. Honda, and Ms. Esty) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend section 399Z–1 of the Public Health Service Act to extend for 5 years the authorization of appropriations for operational grants under the school-based health centers program.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
School-based Health Centers Program Reauthorization Act of 2013 .

section.header: 5-year extension of authorization of appropriations for operational grants under the school-based health centers program
section.text: Section 399Z–1(l) of the Public Health Service Act ( 42 U.S.C. 280h–4(l) ) is amended by striking through 2014 and inserting through 2019.
